videoJson.name: XDCAM
videoJson.aka:
XDCAM SD, XDCAM HD, 
DCAM EX, XDCAM HD422, SxS
videoJson.fact1: XDCAM uses random access solid-state memory media cards to store digital video
videoJson.fact2: This format was mostly used for high-end professional camera work
videoJson.fact3: This format included four different products, XDCAM SD, XDCAM HD, XDCAM EX and XDCAM HD422, which used different encoders, frame size, container types, media, and were marketed for different purposes and budgets
